description: A React functional component called 'Arc' that renders an animated elliptical arc SVG element, utilizing remotion for video configuration and random ID generation for gradients.

methods.name: getCircumferenceOfArc
methods.description: Calculates the circumference of an elliptical arc based on radii rx and ry.

methods.name: Arc
methods.description: React functional component that renders an animated elliptical arc SVG with gradient stroke, animated rotation, and customizable colors.
